name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games™
description: Go for gold with Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games, available now on Nintendo eShop. From official Olympic Games events like 100m, football, archery, golf and BMX to special Plus events from the worlds of Mario and Sonic, you'll never be short of sporting thrills! Compete as your Mii in Road to Rio mode. Choose a gym to join to see a different story unfold! Will you find out what happens in Sonic's story, or in Mario's? You can level up your Mii and power up with outfits. Boost your Mii character's abilities further by equipping all manner of sporting goods! Set your sights on gold! Visit amiibo.nintendo.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
